features: FRUSTRATION-FREE BUILDING - PicassoTiles bristle shape blocks offer easy connectivity and simple to disconnect to maximize fun and build more creative designs. PTB120 enables children to improve hand-eye coordination, gain a strong sense of color, counting, sorting, attention, promotes the child brain development, and focus by using their hands to foster Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math skills

EDUCATIONAL TOY - Never too early to start developing kids' creativity. Children can acquire strong sense of color, structures, geometrical shapes including 3D forms, numbers counts, & architectural design at an early age. No limitations, scalable to build as big as desired by adding more pieces to create the masterpiece. The 120pcs bristle shape building block can build more than 20 creative designs. Bristle shape block construction toys have different add-on pieces to offer open-ended

LEARNING IS FUN - Encourage creativity for STEM (science, technology, engineering, art, and mathematics) education which is the key factor to success in today's ever-changing environment. Fun and entertaining; perfect educational present for school age children that will never go out of style. Bristle shape building blocks are designed fosters hand-eye coordination and problem-solving skills of all ages including preschool, group activity, classroom teamwork, and kindergarten

FUN FOR EVERYBODY - PicassoTiles bristle shape blocks encourage children (3+ and up) and/or families to work together as a team to design the masterpiece structures and build the creations. Entertaining for single or multiple parties and feel the sense of achievement of building together. A great way to spend quality time with the loved ones for family time bonding by playing. Developing kids creativity and STEAM (science, technology, engineering, art, and mathematics) skills

HIGH-QUALITY & NON-TOXIC - Each piece of bristle shape blocks is manufactured by high-quality, toxic-free, and lead safe material with the highest standards to ensure the safety of the children. PTB120 is constructed from the highest quality materials to ensure it's strong and sturdy. Bringing you and your family, fun, and excitement for years to come

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our preschool loves it
reviews.reviewText: High quality and the colors are wonderful. Durable. Lovely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super fun and developes creativity! My little grandchildren ask to play with these all the time and can play with them for hours! There are instructions with plenty of examples but toddlers and children quickly learn to build their own unique creations. Even I like to build with them! We have purchased more than one set because they are such fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Piece break easily, but it's a cheap set. The tines break off easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for toddlers!
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 3 year old nephew and he loved them! My 2 year old enjoys playing with them too. Lots of fun and ways to be creative!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son loves these and they are easy to use. Some bristles have come off after only a couple uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got for my grandson (5) who loves to build. He loves them. He said they also have them at his school for playtime. Easy to use, great to build with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for children to build and use their imagination.
reviews.reviewText: Loved the blocks. Ordered fir great grand children who love to build things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fun, high quality
reviews.reviewText: Enough pieces and variety of pieces to really great creative and have fun, and the guide is helpful for ideas too. Great quality. Not a toy quickly outgrown - I think we will have fun with these for years.

Bought as an Xmas present for 4 &6 year old. Product is very easy to play with the kids love the weight. How they push together. The pamphlet is glossed but I hope in time doesn’t tear or rip. The kids use it to see what parts they need to construct what’s on the picture. This is good for eye hand coordination and comprehension in mind development. Excellent product would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: our grandson loves this. he plays with it all the time with us and on his own. there is always something on the side that he a built. especially rockets and cars. we can see his brain working on design and it gets him using his hands too..
